overview: On the back of brilliant forays into Reunion Island, Mexico and Chile, Rip Curl delivered another one of the world's best professional surfing events when it took the Rip Curl Pro Search 2008 to a magical archipelago  "Somewhere in Indonesia.."  The spinning left handers of two killer locations were just right for the ASP top 45 and especially for Bruce Irons who (like only Mick Fanning and his brother Andy before him) took first place and earned the right to spin the iconic troph that is the Rip Curl Planet.  Join us alongside the world's best surfers on the world's best waves in this epic 50 min feature which hangs on some of the best surf action cinematography and all-out stoking vibe of the Rip Curl Pro Search series.  The Search Never Ends...
title: Rip Curl Pro Search 08: Somewhere
